```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```
```{r}
#use of join
data <- full_join(candidates, contributions, by = c("cand_id"))

#wrangled data
data %>%
  select("cand_party_affiliation", "transaction_type", "entity_type", "transaction_amt")
```
#blog post explaining


```{r}
#function to generalize analysis
party <- function(party_id) {
  data %>%
    filter(cand_party_affiliation == cand_id) %>%
    group_by(transaction_amt) %>%
    summarize(entity_type = n_distinct(entity_type))
}
party(party_id = "DEM")
```
